message.name: HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system or component is present and responding. The type and autopilot fields (along with the message component id), allow the receiving system to treat further messages from this system appropriately.
message.field: Vehicle or component type. For a flight controller component the vehicle type (quadrotor, helicopter, etc.). For other components the component type (e.g. camera, gimbal, etc.).
Autopilot type / class. Use MAV_AUTOPILOT_INVALID for components that are not flight controllers.
MAVLink version, not writable by user, gets added by protocol because of magic data type: t_mavlink_version
